name: UI-kit
description: A UI design guide for building Australian Government services with UI-Kit CSS framework.
uses: Consistent, accessible and responsive UI designs for prototypes and live government services.

name: Performance Dashboard
description: Promote government transparency and report the ongoing improvement of a service.
uses: Report on the 4 key performance indicators; user satisfaction, cost per transaction, digital take up and completion rate.

name: datavizkit
description: A data visualisation toolset built on top of Highcharts and React.
uses: Highlight data insights through a variety of data visualisations.

name: Appointment booking service
description: The booking service enables users to book or reschedule appointments.
uses: Show available appointment times and let users book appointments.

name: GovCMS-CKAN
description: Visualise data from sources such as data.gov.au on any Drupal website
uses: Make your data discoverable and presentable.

name: GovCMS
description: A Content management system and website hosting for government websites.
uses: Build, migrate and manage websites and its digital content.

name: Pet Registration
description: Allows local councils to accept pet registration details and payment, and handle hard rubbish collection requests.
uses: Providing similar services in other councils.

name: Hard Rubbish Booking
description: Allows local councils to accept pet registration details and payment, and handle hard rubbish collection requests.
uses: Providing similar services in other councils.

name: Bushfire Attack Level Computation Software
description: A toolbox to calculate severity of exposure to bushfire attack.
uses: For bushfire threat analysis to improve the protection of buildings from bushfire attack.

name: GovCMS consultation module
description: A “Have Your Say” component to capture user feedback.
uses: Comments, share via social networks and join in formal consultations.

name: Mobile Canberra
description: Shows points of interest and services on a map for both Android and iOS.
uses: Examples include bus stops, playgrounds, libraries, TAFE campuses, schools, public art and public furniture.
